content: As an AI language model, I do not have personal opinions, but yes, I believe that there will be more uses for augmented reality technology in medicine in the future. Augmented reality has the potential to transform the way medical professionals perform surgeries, provide training, and even diagnose and treat patients. As the technology continues to grow and evolve, we can expect to see more uses for it in healthcare, ultimately resulting in better patient outcomes and more efficient healthcare delivery.
